channel.title: Philosophy on Truthmaker Semantics
channel.description: Recent content in Philosophy on Truthmaker Semantics

item.title: Exact Truthmakers
item.description: Unpublished Two-Dimensional Truthmaker Semantics Hasen Khudairi Extends the framework of exact truthmaker semantics with the resources of two-dimensional semantics. Keywords: applications modality exact truthmaking Unpublished manuscript https://philarchive.org/archive/KHUTTS-2 Disjunctive Parts Mark Jago Further refines ideas of (Jago 2020) in the context of the relation of disjunctive parts (in contrast to the concept of conjunctive parts discussed, e.g., in (Fine 2016)). Keywords: exact truthmaking In: Outstanding Contributions to Logic: Kit Fine, edited by Federico LG Faroldi and Frederik Van De Putte.
